Name: Invite Friend
ActivityDes: You can share your invite code to Lv.≥20 commandants. If they use your code, you will have invited them successfully.

Name: Invite Code
ActivityDes: Welcome back to Gray Raven HQ. You can input the invite code of other commandants to receive corresponding rewards.

Name: Return Support
ActivityDes: During the event, commandants in the "Return" state can complete the missions and get the rewards (the event ends when the Return state expires).

Name: The Last Spark
ActivityDes: Instructions: Play through the new main story "The Last Spark" and complete missions.

Name: Atlantis Lost
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. You can obtain event tokens by clearing a stage. Some stages may drop random memories.
2. Event tokens can be used to purchase items from event shop.
3. Clearing a stage will earn you Challenge EXP. Your Authority Level will be increased when you earn a certain amount of Challenge EXP. Increased Authority Level will grant combat bonuses including damage increase.
(Note: Those bonuses can be applied to Atlantis Lost stages only.)

Name: In the Name of a Hero
ActivityTitle: In the Name of a Hero
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. New Interlude added: Vera: Garnet [In the Name of a Hero].
    All commandants at Lv.40 or above can participate in this event during the event period.
2. After the event ends, the above Interlude will be available once you have unlocked [Vera: Garnet]. Your stage progress during the event period will be retained.

Name: Norman Revival Plan
ActivityDes:
[Requirements]: Commandant Lv. 60

 [Event Info]: 
1. Each session lasts 14 days, and you will enter the battle phase when any stage is cleared during the first 4 days (or automatically after the first 4 days). The battle phase lasts 10 days.
2. During the preparation phase, Lv. 60-84 players will automatically enter the "qualifying battle", while players Lv.85+ can choose between "ordinary battle" and "pioneer battle".
3. "Ordinary battle" and "pioneer battle" have identical difficulties. Ordinary battle gives more electricity but fewer rewards, while pioneer battle gives less electricity but more rewards.
4. Multiple teams will be deployed simultaneously. You should dispatch characters according to the battleground environment.
5. You can use power supplied by the Power Station in the team interface to increase Battle Power.
6. You can earn Autonomous Miners and Tantalum Ore every time you clear a stage. Upon daily refresh, Autonomous Miners produce Tantalum Ore and increase the current amount by 50%.
7. You can exchange the Tantalum Ore for rewards in the shop.

Name: Deep Blue Warzone
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.52

Event Info:
1. Deep Blue Warzone consists of 5 areas that will be unlocked over time.

2. Each area has a stage called [Infinite Abyss] that can be challenged repeatedly and several one-off [Target Stages].
Infinite Abyss: There are multiple floors in Infinite Abyss. Before the battle begins, you can choose a character buff. With different combinations of buffs, you can strengthen your characters to your heart's content. The more floors you clear, the more powerful Add-ons you will get. Unlocked floors can be challenged repeatedly.
Target Stage: A one-off stage that can be challenged with your acquired Add-ons. Clearing the stage for the first time rewards you with event items including Data Tracks.

3. As you progress through the Target Stages, various features including [Add-on Fusion Center], [Ultralimit Simulation], [SP Characters], and [Special Enhancement] will be unlocked gradually.
Add-on Fusion Center: It allows you to exchange the Add-on Essences obtained by scrapping the Add-ons for more powerful Add-ons.
Ultralimit Simulation: You can spend minor Add-ons to strengthen your characters.
SP Characters: The power of the SP characters will be enhanced. SP characters will change over time.
Trial Characters: In Deep Blue Warzone, a new trial character will be unlocked every week.
Special Enhancement: You can unlock a character's unique power boost with specific Add-ons.

4. Tactical Supply: [Data Track] can be obtained by clearing the Target Stages and achieving as many floors as you can in Infinite Abyss. You can use them to unlock the Supply Crates in [Tactical Supply] for handsome rewards.

Name: Into the Deep
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. Into the Deep has various stages that will be unlocked over time.
2. You can challenge the stages with trial characters or your own characters.
3. When taking on the Rank Challenges, you can activate powerful buffs with different Add-Ons.
4. Black Cards will be rewarded when you clear a stage for the first time. You will also get rare collectibles after completing the Challenge Mode.

Name: Maelstrom
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv. 60

Event Info:
1. Babel Tower consists of a series of challenging stages.
2. There is a separated environmental affix for each stage, and all challenges of this stage are affected by the environmental affix.
3. You can freely select different strategic targets combinations for each stage, and the selected affixes will added into the stage to make the battle more challenging.
4. Support affixes will be available for each stage, and the selected affixes will support members in battle.
5. The members who cleared the stage will be locked, and cannot be used in other stages.
6. Participate in Babel Tower to obtain collectibles as rewards. Collectibles' quality along with the final strategic level.

Name: Midsummer's Memorial Day
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. To participate in this event, you need to form a 3-man team.
2. In this event, you have to occupy the best spot for photos. The closer you are to the camera, the higher score you will reach.
3. You can get Mischief Points by tapping the attack button to obstruct other players.
4. This event has daily missions that grant different rewards.
5. There are 5 maps in this event for you to make and share your own funny photos!

Name: Tales of the Sunken City
ActivityDes:
Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. Tales of the Sunken City has a total of 10 stages with increasing difficulty.
2. You have to challenge the stages with your own characters.
3. Special missions will appear in battle. Completing those missions will grant powerful buffs.
4. If you fail to complete the missions, the time for your enemies to activate Overload Mode will be shortened.

Name: Themed Research
ActivityDes:
New Construct:
※S-Rank Lightning Tank [Vera: Garnet]
New Weapon:
※6★ [Phoenix] (Banner Spear)

Info:
1. Construct Research:
※[Vera: Garnet] will be available in the [Themed Construct] Research Pool.
Players have a 100% chance to get [Vera: Garnet]
when they get a S-Rank Construct.
2. Weapon Research:
※[Phoenix] will be available in the [Target Weapon] Research Pool
with the same rules and rates as other weapons.

Name: New Coating - Garnet
ActivityDes:
New Coating:
Coating of Construct [Vera: Garnet]: [Sorrowful Rose]

Info:
[Sorrowful Rose] will be on sale at "30% off" in
"Purchase - Coating Supply Pack" during the event.
It will be available for purchase at the original
price in Coating Shop after the event.

Name: New Coating - Plume
ActivityDes:
New Coating:
Construct [Lucia: Plume] Coating: [Dance of Ripplets]

Info:
During this event, [Dance of Ripplets] can be obtained in the
"Research - Endless Summer Blue" pool for a limited time.
The Coating Research will require [Mermaid's Gift].
[Dance of Ripplets] is guaranteed in the first 10 pulls.

Name: New Coating - Pulse
ActivityDes:
New Coating:
Coating of Construct [Nanami: Pulse]: [Beach Frolics]

Info:
[Beach Frolics] will be on sale at "30% off" in
"Purchase - Coating Supply Pack" during the event.
It will no longer be available for purchase after the event.

Name: New Decor Gift Pack
ActivityDes:
Decor Set:
1. School Festival Decor Blueprint at 20 Rainbow Cards.
※Contains: 1 of each Decor Blueprint in the Set for a total of 19.
2. Decor Set at 68 Rainbow Cards.
※Contains: Set Blueprint Bundle x3, 1 piece of each Finished Decor, and Set Decor Self Select Blueprint x20.
3. Decor Template Set at 68 Rainbow Cards.
※Contains: Template Dormitory - all A-Rank Decor set that has 32 pieces of Decors.

Name: Leaving Again for the New World Supply
ActivityTitle: Leaving Again for the New World Supply
ActivityDes: Instructions: Complete event missions to obtain event rewards.

Name: Treasure Rush
ActivityDes:
Solve the puzzles and find the legendary treasure with your Constructs!

Requirements: Commandant Lv.40

Event Info:
1. A new Dragon Boat Festival-themed game mode is added.
      All commandants at Lv.40 or above can participate in this game mode during the event period.
2. It contains 4 chapters that will be unlocked over time during the event period.

Name: Warrior's Triumph
ActivityDes: Mission Info: Participate in the [Warrior's Triumph] Trial Stage and complete the missions.

Name: Dance of Ripplets
ActivityDes: Instructions: Experience the Special Effect Coating [Dance of Ripplets].

Name: Aria of Nymph
ActivityDes: Instructions: Experience the Special Effect Coating [Aria of Nymph].

Name: Beach Frolics
ActivityDes: Instructions: Experience the Special Effect Coating [Beach Frolics].

Name: Joker in the Barrel
ActivityDes: Instructions: Complete event missions to obtain [Sword Command].

Name: New Start Supply
ActivityDes: Instructions: Complete event missions to obtain event rewards.

Name: エネルギー回収作戦
ActivityDes:
イベント説明：
1、デイリー任務または「購入」でイベントコインを獲得できます。
2、イベントコインを消費してディテクターを起動し、エリアを探索できます。
3、探索によって探索スコアを獲得でき、一定のスコアが貯まると報酬がもらえます
4、汎用ディテクターは消費電力と獲得できるスコアが少なく、広域ディテクターは消費電力と獲得できるスコアが多いです
5、イベントコイン-ボタン型電池はイベント後に期限切れになります。時間内に使用してください。

Name: エネルギー回収作戦SP
ActivityDes:
イベント説明：
1、デイリー任務または「購入」でイベントコインを獲得できます。
2、イベントコインを消費してディテクターを起動し、エリアを探索できます。
3、探索によって探索スコアを獲得でき、一定のスコアが貯まると報酬がもらえます
4、エネルギー回収作戦SPのイベントコイン、スコア、報酬は回収作戦とは別々にカウントします。
5、イベントコイン-ボタン型電池SPはイベント後に期限切れになります。時間内に使用してください。

Name: アーリーサマーミッション
ActivityTitle: アーリーサマーミッション
ActivityDes: 累計で一定数の血清を消費すると、星5意識「ヴィラ·スカーレットサマー」を獲得できます
